display_long_description: My puppy: Basset Hound​ – Let This Cute Pup "Truly" Move Into Your Home!​ Say goodbye to screen barriers! With MR (Mixed Reality), the adorable Basset Hound will truly "step into" your life!​ Real Scenes: Real-world scenes are accurately recreated. The Basset Hound will curl up and nap in the corner of your actual living room, or lie on the carpet beside your real bedroom bed, staying with you quietly just like a real pet.​ Real Interactions: Reach out to grab the toy ball or sausage on the table and throw them – the Basset Hound will dash over joyfully to catch and bring them back accurately. When it catches the sausage, it will even wag its tail at you. Reach out to pet it, and the soft, fluffy texture of its fur is exactly the same as stroking a real dog!​ My puppy: Basset Hound uses the "authenticity" of MR to "recreate real-world scenes as true environments", making every moment of interaction feel like embracing a real cute dog.
